text: Bi rasti ewane bune file u gava mirine ji bi fileti mirine hene! Ji tu keseki ji wan, weki tijibuna cihane zer ji bidin, ji bo ku ji sapatan fereste bibin, dayina wan naye lite kirine (ewan cihane tiji zer bikin, ji bona ferestiya xwe ji agir, bidin, disa ewan ji sapat u ji agir fereste nabin). Evan in. ku ji bona wan ra sapatek e dilsoz heye u ji bona wen ra qe tu arikari ji tune ye
